text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: dim staircase, tense atmosphere>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Svidrigaïlov: “You don’t seem yourself.”  
Raskolnikov: “I’m... just lost in thought.”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Cheer up! We’ll talk soon.”  

---

<setup: somber room, priest and children present>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: “The requiem... it feels suffocating.”  
Raskolnikov: “So much death, so much weight.”  
Children: *softly weeping, kneeling by the coffin*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov discusses the placement of orphans and expresses concern for Raskolnikov's well-being while preparing for a requiem service.
